response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for us at $1,200,000. Recognizing its significance and potential impact on your endeavors, I am extending an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special price of $950,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its intrinsic value, making it an attractive proposition for you. I believe this investment could greatly benefit your business or personal goals. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
